entry.title: FOG ADVISORY, Winnipeg (The Forks)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:55 a.m. CDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing near midnight. Fog patches overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 10:15 PM CDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 13. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 10:15 PM CDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%
